item.description: We have a table for 20 reserved so seating is limited. The DJ comes around 9sh, but we needed to get the table early cause it gets crowded. This place has the best sushi and food around! Its truly a great time!! You don't have to do karaoke to have a good time so come hang out and enjoy the music, singing and food!!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the bar or ask for me at the host stand.
item.why: This is the best hang out around the area. They are open till 2 am!! awesome food and great music and karaoke.
item.name: Sushi and Karaoke at Samba
